module.name: plist2json
module.short: Contains routines used to convert the content in an XML document to its representation using JSON (JavaScript Object Notation).
module.descr: Used in the implementation of the TextMate grammar parser in the LazEdit package.

element.name: PListXml2Json
element.short: Converts the content in the specified XML document to its representation using JSON (JavaScript Object Notation).

descr.p: Used in the implementation of the TextMate grammar parser in the LazEdit package.

element.name: PListXml2Json.Result
element.short: TJSON instance with the content for the XML document.

element.name: PListXml2Json.AnXml
element.short: TXMLDocument with the grammar definitions converted in the routine.
